Package org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.filter

Everything needed for resource request/response filtering.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecuirityContextFilter
    Interface for security context filter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationResourceFilters
    Filters the request/response for authentication.
    SecurityContextFilterAnonymous
    Always inject User.ANONYMOUS into the requests security context.
    SecurityContextFilterDigest
    Filters resource request/response for digest authentication.
    SecurityContextImpl
    Implementation of security context.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Authentication  

Package org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.filter Description

Everything needed for resource request/response filtering.
